thread.title: Siddharth, Karthik star for Karnataka in drawn match
thread.title_full: Siddharth, Karthik star for Karnataka in drawn match - The Times of India

author: Sunil Subbaiah
title: Siddharth, Karthik star for Karnataka in drawn match
text:
BENGALURU: KV Siddharth slammed a century (117) while CA Karthik missed out on a ton by a run as Karnataka collected three points by virtue of their first innings lead against Bengal in their opening match of the Col CK Nayudu U-23 four-day format cricket match that ended in a draw at the Jadavpur University ground in Kolkata on Tuesday.
Apart from Siddharth and Karthik, openers Abhishek Reddy (55) and D Nischal (59) too made significant contributions as Karnataka posted a first innings 455. In reply, Bengal rode Pramod Chandila's 97 before being bowled out for 368. Leg-spinner KC Cariappa picked up three wickets while Prasidh Krishna, Prateek Jain and KN Bharath claimed two each. Karnataka were 157/5 in their second innings.
Karnataka, who made it to the semifinals last season before losing to Uttar Pradesh by six wickets in Mysore, will take on hosts Mumbai from Oct 17-20.
Brief scores: Karnataka: 455 all out in 150.3 overs (Abhishek Reddy 55, D Nischal 59, KN Bharath 42, KV Siddharth 117, S Sharath 33, CA Karthik 99; Sayan Ghosh 2-81, Gani 2-95, S Tiwari 4-134) & 157/5 in 55 overs (Abhishek Reddy 39, D Nischal 29, KN Bharath 37; Sayan Ghosh 3-53) drew with Bengal: 368 all out in 137 overs (S Bal 65, SS Das 84, P Chandila 97; Prasidh 2-70, Prateek Jain 2-36, KC Cariappa 3-111, Bharath 2-53).
